DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm , open-label , multicentre phase II study evaluate safety efficacy combination G.O.N.O . FOLFOXIRI regimen bevacizumab first-line treatment metastatic colorectal cancer .
DOC.brief_title: First-line FOLFOXIRI In Combination With Bevacizumab For Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
